templates.name: AI Saree Portrait
templates.prompt: Create a 4K HD portrait of the uploaded person wearing a flowing chiffon saree in a 90s-Bollywood style. Warm golden-hour side lighting, wind gently sweeping the fabric, soft film grain texture. Keep the face exactly as in the uploaded photo, no changes.

templates.name: 3D Action Figurine
templates.prompt: Turn the uploaded person (or pet) into a high-detail plastic action figure in a collector's display box. Pose dynamic, with stylized lighting, ultra-realistic textures, glossy finish, dramatic shadows.

templates.name: Polaroid with Celebrity
templates.prompt: Generate a Polaroid-style photo of the uploaded person standing next to [famous actor/character], casual candid pose, slightly faded vintage colour palette, white Polaroid border, snapshot feel.

templates.name: Festive Couple Portrait
templates.prompt: Create a cinematic portrait of a couple (the uploaded person + partner) in traditional Indian festive attire (saree + kurta) surrounded by diyas, marigolds, warm ambient lighting, backdrop of festive lights. 4K resolution.

templates.name: Vintage 80s/90s Throwback
templates.prompt: Transform the uploaded person into a stylish 1980s mall-portrait scene: pastel blazer, high-waisted pants, retro filter, slightly grainy film texture, neon signage in the background, excited pose.

templates.name: Travel Landmarks
templates.prompt: Place the uploaded person in front of the Eiffel Tower at dusk, gently lit, cinematic wide-angle, shallow depth of field, warm glow, subtle motion-blur on crowds — make it feel like a travel snapshot.

templates.name: Fashion Style Transformation
templates.prompt: Re-imagine the uploaded person wearing a minimal-chic modern Indian outfit (monochrome saree or fusion pants + kurta), surrounded by a tastefully decorated interior with plants, soft natural lighting, high-end editorial feel.

templates.name: Pet as Hero Figurine
templates.prompt: Turn the uploaded pet into a heroic figurine: muscular pose, stylised armour or cape, dramatic spotlight, pedestal base, poster-style composition, ultra-detailed fur texture.

templates.name: Family Festive Scene
templates.prompt: Create a large family portrait in Indian festive dress, everyone coordinated colours, warm golden lighting, elegant hall backdrop, smiley candid moment, cinematic quality.

templates.name: Festival Street Scene
templates.prompt: Place the uploaded person on an Indian festival-lit street at night: string lights, paper lanterns, bustling crowd, warm ambient glow, motion-blur on passing vehicles, high dynamic range.

templates.name: Interior Design Makeover
templates.prompt: Show the uploaded person standing in a newly styled open-plan living room: Scandinavian Indian fusion décor, plants, muted palette, large windows, soft natural daylight, editorial photograph.

templates.name: Character Consistency
templates.prompt: Generate four frames of the uploaded person in different outfits (traditional, casual, formal, street) but same face and same hair-style for continuity, arranged as a photo-wall layout, consistent lighting and background.

templates.name: Moonlight Romance
templates.prompt: Create a romantic night-scene of the uploaded person (or couple) under a full moon, gentle wind, soft moonlight casting long shadows, subtle film grain, deep blue-purple tones, dreamy ambience.

templates.name: Gold Jewellery Glamour
templates.prompt: Transform the uploaded person into a high-glamour portrait wearing heavy gold jewellery, designer saree or lehenga, rich backdrop of marigolds and diyas, soft cinematic lighting, ultra-realistic metal textures.

templates.name: Minimalist Modern
templates.prompt: Style the uploaded person in a modern, minimalist outfit (solid-colour asymmetrical drape), standing in a minimalist interior (white walls, geometric décor, single sculptural plant), natural daylight, no clutter.

templates.name: Younger & Older Self
templates.prompt: Create an image of the uploaded adult person sitting across from their younger-self (child version) in a cozy vintage living room, shared tea-cup table, warm nostalgic lighting, photorealistic, same face in both but different age.

templates.name: Sci-Fi Traditional Fusion
templates.prompt: Place the uploaded person wearing a traditional Indian outfit (saree or kurta) inside a futuristic sci-fi environment (hovering city, neon lights, flying vehicles), dramatic cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed textures.

templates.name: Floral Rangoli Art
templates.prompt: Generate an overhead shot of the uploaded person sitting next to a giant creative rangoli made of flowers and sweets, vibrant colours, soft morning light, top-down view, decorative festive mood.

templates.name: Rooftop Fireworks
templates.prompt: Create a dynamic evening rooftop scene: the uploaded person surrounded by friends, holding sparklers, fireworks bursting in the sky behind, city skyline in background, motion-blur, high energy, rich colour palette.

templates.name: Chiffon Saree in Motion
templates.prompt: Make a full-length portrait of the uploaded person wearing a semi-transparent chiffon saree flowing in wind, sunset glow on fabric, warm back-light, soft film grain, couture-magazine style.

templates.name: Toy Figurine Packaging
templates.prompt: Convert the uploaded person into a high-detail toy-figurine inside a collector's box: bold packaging graphics, acrylic window, design branding style, dramatic studio lighting, high-gloss finish.

templates.name: 16-bit Game Character
templates.prompt: Turn the uploaded person into a 16-bit video game pixel-art character, standing in a colorful retro platformer level, pixel clouds and 8-bit enemies visible in background, nostalgic game vibe.

templates.name: Hologram AR Portrait
templates.prompt: Create a futuristic hologram-style portrait of the uploaded person: translucent digital overlay, neon outlines, floating data lines, dark background, glowing edges, sci-fi atmosphere.

templates.name: Celebrity Mash-up
templates.prompt: Generate a realistic photograph of the uploaded person standing next to [celebrity name] on a red carpet event, both posing, flashing cameras, glamorous gowns/suits, high contrast studio lighting.

templates.name: Coordinated Family
templates.prompt: Create a joyful family photo of the uploaded person + family members wearing coordinated pastel Indian festive outfits, garden-setting, string lights overhead, casual candid smiles, high-resolution, bright natural lighting.

templates.name: Geometric Festive Decor
templates.prompt: Style the uploaded person in a contemporary festive outfit standing in front of a minimal geometric wall art installation, muted colours, accent light from one side, soft shadows, editorial portrait.

templates.name: Cinematic Temple
templates.prompt: Create a dramatic portrait of the uploaded person standing in an ancient temple corridor, shafts of golden light through stone lattice, rich textures on stone walls, heavy shadows, cinematic feel.

templates.name: Color-Pop Fashion
templates.prompt: Transform the uploaded person into a bold fashion portrait: bright fuchsia outfit, contrasting background (turquoise), dramatic side-lighting, high-gloss magazine-style finish, strong makeup.

templates.name: Scenic Wind Movement
templates.prompt: Generate an image of the uploaded person on a cliff-edge overlooking the sea, scarf or dupatta flowing in strong wind, golden hour light, dynamic pose, cinematic framing.

templates.name: Shallow Depth Portrait
templates.prompt: Create a studio-style portrait of the uploaded person: shallow depth-of-field (blurry background), dramatic rim lighting, soft key-light, monochrome outfit, minimalist setting, high-end editorial look.

templates.name: You as a Child
templates.prompt: Transform this person to look like they did as a child, age 5-8 years old, innocent expression, playful, bright eyes, soft features

templates.name: 80s Retro
templates.prompt: Transform with vibrant 80s aesthetic: neon colors, retro style, vintage film grain, nostalgic vibes, bold fashion, classic 1980s look

templates.name: Cyberpunk
templates.prompt: Transform into cyberpunk style: neon lights, futuristic, dark atmospheric, tech noir, blade runner aesthetic, glowing circuits, dystopian future

templates.name: Watercolor Art
templates.prompt: Transform into beautiful watercolor painting: soft edges, flowing colors, artistic, hand-painted texture, paper grain, delicate washes

templates.name: Anime Style
templates.prompt: Transform into anime art style: cel-shaded, vibrant colors, expressive large eyes, manga aesthetic, clean linework, Japanese animation

templates.name: Superhero
templates.prompt: Transform into superhero: powerful heroic pose, dramatic lighting, epic atmosphere, comic book style, cape flowing, heroic proportions

templates.name: Vintage Film
templates.prompt: Transform into vintage photograph: sepia tones, film grain, faded colors, nostalgic 1950s aesthetic, classic photography, timeless

templates.name: Oil Painting
templates.prompt: Transform into classical oil painting: rich textures, painterly visible brushstrokes, renaissance style, museum quality, classical art masterpiece

templates.name: Film Noir
templates.prompt: Transform into film noir style: high contrast black and white, dramatic hard shadows, 1940s detective movie aesthetic, mystery, moody

templates.name: Fantasy Portrait
templates.prompt: Transform into fantasy portrait: magical atmosphere, ethereal lighting, mythical, elvish features, enchanted, mystical aura, fantasy realm

templates.name: Pixel Art
templates.prompt: Transform into pixel art: 8-bit style, retro gaming aesthetic, limited color palette, crisp square pixels, nostalgic video game look

templates.name: Pencil Sketch
templates.prompt: Transform into detailed pencil sketch: crosshatching, graphite texture, artistic hand-drawn, charcoal shading, realistic sketch

templates.name: Pop Art
templates.prompt: Transform into pop art: bold vibrant colors, high contrast, halftone dots, Andy Warhol style, screen print aesthetic, iconic pop culture

templates.name: Zombie
templates.prompt: Transform into zombie: realistic decaying skin, horror makeup, undead features, spooky dark atmosphere, walking dead aesthetic

templates.name: Medieval Portrait
templates.prompt: Transform into medieval portrait: renaissance painting style, historical period clothing, classical composition, oil painting technique, regal

templates.name: Neon Glow
templates.prompt: Add vibrant neon glow effects: bright neon colors, electric atmosphere, glowing edges, illuminated, nighttime vibrancy

templates.name: Cartoon
templates.prompt: Transform into cartoon character: simplified features, bold black outlines, bright flat colors, animated style, fun and playful

templates.name: Gothic
templates.prompt: Transform into gothic style: dark moody atmosphere, dramatic, Victorian gothic fashion, mysterious, elegant darkness

templates.name: Cosmic
templates.prompt: Transform with cosmic space theme: swirling galaxies, colorful nebulas, stars, cosmic colors, space atmosphere, celestial

templates.name: Steampunk
templates.prompt: Transform into steampunk style: Victorian era fashion, brass gears, mechanical elements, industrial aesthetic, vintage technology
